skills.name: Ice Ring Waltz
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>. This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Overwhelming Ice</color>.
skills.description: Deals 3 Cryo DMG. This character gains Overwhelming Ice.

skills.name: Plunging Ice Shards
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K5]</color> to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121033]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color></color> to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing Iceridge</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Cryo DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 Piercing Iceridge.

skills.name: Cryo Crystal Core
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, starts with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121036]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If this character has yet to gain a $[C121036], then it will gain a $[C121036] again. (Triggers a maximum of once in a single duel)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, starts with <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystal Core</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If this character has yet to gain a Cryo Crystal Core, then it will gain a Cryo Crystal Core again. (Triggers a maximum of once in a single duel)
skills.description:
(Passive) When the battle begins, starts with Cryo Crystal Core.
When Action Phase begins: If this character has yet to gain a Cryo Crystal Core, then it will gain a Cryo Crystal Core again. (Triggers a maximum of once in a single duel)

skills.name: Elemental Sedimentation: Cryo
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C131071]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Lifeform: Cryo</color>.
